conversations.description: Procurement analyst requests a risk report for a new hardware supplier, including latest financials and news sentiment.
Compliance officer asks for any sanctions or adverse media flags for a long‑term logistics partner.
Finance team wants a deep‑dive summary of a vendor’s cash‑flow trends over the past three fiscal years.
Procurement manager compares risk scores of three shortlisted software vendors before final selection.
ESG officer requests a sustainability compliance overview for a raw‑material provider.

Legal counsel needs to verify if a potential vendor appears on any international sanction lists.

CFO asks for a PDF export of the full reliability report for board review.
